headline: 나는 Pando입니다.
description: 일련의 개방형 금융 프로토콜을 포함하는 MTG로 구축된 탈중앙화 금융 네트워크입니다.
product.lake.title: Pando Lake
product.lake.subtitle: 자동화된 유동성 제공을 위한 완전히 탈중앙화된 프로토콜입니다.
product.lake.hlight: You can swap and earn at Pando Lake or 4swap.
product.lake.hlight_text1: Pando Lake only allow for selected pools that have strong community base and proven credential.
product.lake.hlight_text2: 4swap is totally driven by the community, anyone can join the community and send request to list new pools.
product.lake.feat_text_1: Trade without the need for gas fees
product.lake.feat_text_2: Trades will be confirmed in seconds
product.lake.mtg_text: Lake & 4swap is built with Mixin Trusted Group. At present, there are 5 genesis nodes who serve the trades.
product.leaf.title: Pando Leaf
product.leaf.subtitle: 탈중앙화 금융 네트워크는 파생 상품 유동성 프로토콜을 구현합니다.
product.leaf.hlight: Deposit collateral to generate pUSD in Pando Leaf
product.leaf.hlight_text1: Pando USD is considered a stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar
product.leaf.feat_text_1: Pando USD is considered a stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar. You can always consider 1 pUSD for US$1.00
product.leaf.feat_text_2: The collateral rates are always higher than 200%
product.leaf.feat_text_3: You can store pUSD in any ERC20 compatible wallet
product.leaf.mtg_text: Leaf is built with Mixin Trusted Group. At present, there are 6 genesis nodes who serve the service.
product.leaf.table_text: pUSD is more secure, more importantly, and has a better future
product.leaf.table_val_collateral_assets: Cash, bonds, loans and other investments
product.rings.title: Pando Rings
product.rings.subtitle: 알고리즘의 자율적인 금리 프로토콜.
product.rings.hlight: A place where you can lend or borrow cryptocurrencies
product.rings.hlight_text1: Pando Rings lets users deposit cryptocurrencies and earn interest, or borrow other cryptoassets against them.
product.rings.feat_text_1: When users supply an asset to Pando Rings, they begin earning interest instantly
product.rings.feat_text_2: There is no time limit for borrowing, please rest assured to borrow
product.rings.mtg_text: Rings is built with Mixin Trusted Group. At present, there are 6 genesis nodes who serve the service.
product.root.title: Pando Root
product.root.subtitle: 곧 나올 미스터리 프로젝트.
footer.documents.title: 사용자 및 개발자를 위한 Pando 문서
footer.blog.title: Pando 공식 블로그
